name.baseName: 水泥，硅酸盐粉煤灰水泥

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Blended hydraulic cement with fly ash; Type IP cement; Low-heat cement; Green cement; Sulfate-resistant Portland cement; Fly ash Portland cement; Environment-friendly cement
Blended hydraulic cement with fly ash; Type IP cement; Low-heat cement; Green cement; Sulfate-resistant Portland cement; Fly ash Portland cement; Environment-friendly cement
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Portland fly-ash cement is a type of blended cement which incorporates fly ash as a significant component. The product is known for its durability and improved environmental profile due to the utilization of fly ash, a byproduct from coal combustion in power plants. The processing level of this cement includes the grinding and homogenization of clinker with fly ash. It often meets specific industry standards such as ASTM or EN, highlighting quality assurances. Usage information includes applications in general construction, particularly in concrete structures requiring enhanced sulfate resistance. The production route involves the mixing of Portland clinker with a certain proportion of fly ash. Typically, this type of cement is part of a production mix, and its availability is often denoted as 'to consumer' indicating it is ready for commercial use.

波特兰粉煤灰水泥是一种掺合水泥，其显著特点是将粉煤灰作为主要成分。该产品因采用电厂燃煤过程中产生的副产品粉煤灰而闻名，因此在耐久性和环保特性上有所提高。这种水泥的加工水平包括与粉煤灰磨细和均化熟料。它通常满足ASTM或EN等特定行业标准，这突出了质量保证。使用信息包括一般建筑领域的应用，特别是在需要提高硫酸盐阻力的混凝土结构中。生产路线涉及与一定比例的粉煤灰混合波特兰熟料。这种类型的水泥通常是生产混合物的一部分，其可用性通常标为'面向消费者'，表明它已准备好进行商业使用。
